detail_desc: Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Short, elasticated shaft with a crocheted lace frill at the top.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops and a small lace trim.

Sleeveless jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Fastening with a concealed press-stud at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Sleeveless jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Fastening with a concealed press-stud at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and a sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Two flounces around the neckline, and horizontal ties across the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and a sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Two flounces around the neckline, and horizontal ties across the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Knee-length shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring and fake fly with a button. Front and back pockets and legs with contrasting colour side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and short chain with a surfboard-shaped pendant.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Cap in a linen and cotton weave with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Knee-length shorts in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and sewn-in turn-ups with overlocked edges at the hems.
Shorts in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, and fake back pockets.
Shorts in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal side pockets, and fake back pockets.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Vest top with a text print on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Scuba sandals that have adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening over the foot and around the ankle. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Scuba sandals that have adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening over the foot and around the ankle. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.

Short dress in a crinkled weave with embroidery at the top. Square, elasticated, frill-trimmed neckline and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gathered seam on the skirt for added width and soft draping. The skirt has a jersey lining.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and flounces that go over the arms held in place by narrow elastication. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and flounces that go over the arms held in place by narrow elastication. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Shorter top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short puff sleeves.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wide lace trim at the top and hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose and cotton weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves. Buttons down the front, short sleeves and a smocked skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Platform Derby shoes with lacing at the top and contrasting colour stitching around the soles. Linings and insoles in recycled polyester, and fluted soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
Moisturising lip balm with a watermelon flavour. 4 g.
Treggings in soft, stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline, smocked bodice and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long sleeves.
Block-coloured trousers in sweatshirt fabric with a text print on one leg. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
